channel.title: Problem with IRC?
channel.description:
Everytime I join IRC (on the computer I'm on for vacation), I get sent to local.host on irc.moparisthebest.com or irc.moparisthebest.com with some guy named Marvin_
[code][14:27] Disconnected from irc.moparisthebest.com [14:28] Connecting... [14:28] Logging in... [14:28] -- *** Looking up your hostname... [14:28] -- *** Checking Ident [14:28] -- *** No Ident response [14:28] Welcome to the Internet Relay Network LilXCj [14:28] Your host is localhost[localhost/6667], running version 2.8/hybrid-6.2 [14:28] -- *** Your host is localhost[localhost/6667], running version 2.8/hybrid-6.2 [14:28] This server was created Thu Dec 6 2001 at 11:52:49 EST [14:28] localhost.localdomain 2.8/hybrid-6.2 oOiwszcrkfydnxb biklmnopstve [14:28] There are 2 users and 0 invisible on 1 servers [14:28] I have 2 clients and 0 servers [14:28] Current local users: 2 Max: 2 [14:28] Current global users: 2 Max: 2 [14:28] Highest connection count: 2 (2 clients) (2 since server was (re)started) [14:28] - Where's the kaboom? There was supposed to be an earth shattering kaboom. [14:29] Disconnected from irc.moparisthebest.com [14:29] Connecting... [14:29] Logging in... [/code]

item.title: Problem with IRC?
